message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper focuses on the task of recommending appropriate emojis in multi-turn dialogue systems, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics related to natural language processing and computational linguistics. Additionally, the paper proposes a hierarchical long short-term memory model (H-LSTM) for dialogue representation, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.AI and cs.LG). The paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) techniques for understanding the contextual information in dialogues. Finally, the paper discusses the significance of emoji recommendation in making dialogue systems more anthropomorphic and vivid, which could be categorized under social and information sciences (cs.SI).
